transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan boliye sir.
Executive: Haan Aartim good morning.
Customer: Good morning.
Executive: Ji kaise hain mam aap?
Customer: Haan main theek.
Executive: Ji main aapne se baat kar raha hun main media mart se aapka account manager.
Customer: Haan ji boliye.
Executive: Ji ji ji mam kal aapse baat hui thi na video conference aapke discuss hua tha guide kiya tha maine to usi time aapne kal jab call kiya tha na jo jo mera ye number hai company wala jisse main aapse baat kar raha hun.
Executive: To us time jab aapne call kiya tha to hum log already video meet pe the to aapki call miss call ho gayi thi mam right utha nahi paya tha main.
Executive: Aur hamara sara discussion jo ho gaya tha wo video call pe ho gaya tha mam.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Fir maine guide kiya tha aapko na mam.
Executive: To aapka na yahan par usi time pe call back maine kiya nahi tha kyunki hum log meeting pe kaam kar rahe the to aapka usi miss call ka system mein miss call dikha diya ki aapne miss call pe call back nahi kiya jo miss call aayi thi theek hai ji.
Executive: To uska ticket open ho gaya like ticket bolte kal generate ho gaya ki aapne miss call ka call back nahi kiya to uska hamare pass concern generate ho gaya theek hai mam.
Executive: To haan uske liye bhi maine call kiya tha aur second mein mujhe ye batao ki jab humne kal catalog pe kaam kiya maine dekha hai aapne catalog pe to kaafi product mein aapne.
Customer: Haan maine product mein kuch kuch add kiya hai.
Executive: Right right right photo add kiya hai aapke product mein.
Customer: Right.
Executive: Haan haan maine dekha aapka matlab aapne kai sare product mein photo add kiya hai lekin mam aapko ek cheez batana chahunga jo photo hamara tha na wo 1000 pixel ka nahi tha uska size kam tha mam.
Customer: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Aapne haan kaafi product mein aapne add kiya hai uska usme score nahi mil raha hai kyunki uska jo pixel hai na.
Customer: Aapne bola tha na ki wo matlab hum bolenge matlab aap photo add kar dijiye wo cutting karke main dal dungi isliye maine.
Executive: Theek hai main kar dunga.
Executive: Haan aap koi baat nahi aap ek baar sara sa kaam kar do mam theek hai aur yahan par price hai price dal do specification specification proper dal do description description aap dal pao dal do otherwise main dal dunga aap update kar dena sir maine aapke yahan se kaam kar diya aap ek baar aap sara sa cover kar do aur kam se kam teen teen photo add karna mam theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai main kar dungi.
Executive: Zada aapne single single photo add kiya tha teen teen photo kam se kam teen teen photo dal dena mam aur kai sare product mein abhi haan kai sare photo mein product mein photo images add nahi hai mam theek hai wo aap add kar dijiyega.
Customer: Theek hai main kar de rahi hun aaj dekh ke haan.
Executive: Theek hai aur second mam jaise maine aapko bataya tha aapne abhi I hope mam aap aise hi kaam kar rahe hoge same jaise maine bataya tha ki at least teen teen teen teen reply karna apne lead manager pe.
Customer: Ji main teen teen reply bhi kar rahi hun.
Executive: Haan kam se kam.
Customer: Reply bhi jyada nahi le rahi hun matlab lead aa raha hai main le le rahi hun turant.
Executive: Haan wo maine kal ka effective bhi dekha tha mam to kal se thoda mere ko improvement bhi dikh raha hai mam theek hai aur LMS ka aapka thoda sa kam use ho raha tha abhi aap log properly lead manager pe reply bhi kar rahe ho dikh bhi raha hai mere ko theek hai aur kya kehte hain jo recent ki jo by list wagera bhi aapne dekh raha hun kal kal se aapne jo turant ki leads aayi hai wo aapne consume bhi ki hai right mam.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Theek hai achcha mam jaise maine aapko bataya tha ki aap recently consume karo to usse kuch aapko improvement dikha hai mam.
Customer: Ji main do customer se baat ki hun to unhone bola hai ki matlab main visit karne jaungi company mein.
Executive: Achcha matlab wo visit karne aayenge aapke yahan.
Customer: Haan bole hain ab pata nahi bolte to bahut koi hai batate nahi hai.
Executive: Follow follow up mein rakhna mam bilkul.
Customer: Haan follow up mein rakhe hain.
Executive: Apna aap jaise ye jo haan jaise aap jitne buyer se contact karte ho mam to inko kahin aap apna diary wagera maintain karte ho excel tak.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Achcha excel ya diary rakhega aapke paas.
Customer: Diary hai.
Executive: Diary to lead manager se aap aapne kaise maintain jaise maine aapko bataya tha labels wagera ka aapko maine is bare mein bataya hoga na ek baar.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan labels mein jaise jo follow up mein ho to follow up ka label laga lo interested buyer interested buyer ka label laga lo jo not interested buyer hai aap uska laga lo mam.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Haan aur jo buyer aapke connect nahi ho rahe hain unko connected non connected ka wo non contactable to abhi jo connected nahi ho pa rahe hain unka non connected ka wo laga lo mam filter to isse aapka hai na aapka ek segment by segment aapka sara data save ho jayega mam.
Customer: Achcha achcha achcha.
Executive: To wo aapko pata hai mam labels wagera kaise lagate hain.
Customer: Nahi wo mujhe nahi pata hai.
Executive: Aapko main ek baar guide karun time pe aapko ek baar main abhi kaam kar rahi hun to main aapko tiffin time pe ek baar call kar rahi hun to fir aap mujhe bata dijiyega.
Executive: Theek hai by the way aapko halka sa ek review bata de raha hun kaise hoga agar aap phone pe agar aap phone pe ya laptop wagera aapke samne agar open ho india india open kar leni aap mam.
Customer: Hmm boliye hum karte hain ek second.
Executive: Aap lead manager open kijiye ek baar.
Customer: Haan maine kiya.
Executive: Theek hai koi ek buyer ki chat open kijiye aap.
Customer: Ji kar di.
Executive: Kar liya ab dekho jaise right side mein aap dekho jahan pe call ka option aa raha hai wahan par ek option aa raha hai view more ka option aa raha hai mam.
Customer: View more.
Executive: Haan haan to ek to yahan se ek option jo aapko kal ask for review wala yahan se aapko ek ask for review ka link chala jayega mam theek hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Aur second aap ek baar option dekho yahan par aapko aa raha hoga labels ka option aa raha hai mam.
Customer: Labels.
Executive: Haan labels.
Customer: Nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: To aapko add load ka option aa raha hoga mam theek hai add contact haan aur labels ka option ek minute ruko aap ya connected hai wahan se bhi aap kar sakte ho mam jahan par likha hua hai na connected wahan par aap labels labels ka option yahan par aata to hai basically yahan par ek minute rukiye ye mere sath dummy account hai na aapke yahan par view more pe aapne click kar nahi raha hai.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ek second ek second haan hold mat jao.
Customer: Achcha ye aap mere ko thodi der baad bataiyega main matlab call aa raha hai mera.
Executive: Aap call receive kar lo mam.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Yes mam.
Customer: Kuchh kya hai bol.
Customer: Hello haan.
Executive: Yes mam haan.
Customer: Ek second ek second dono ka call ye ho raha hai.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji Aartim mam.
Customer: Sir waise dono ka call aa ja raha hai mera whatsapp pe call aa raha hai main aapko cut kar rahi hun theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai main aapko call back karta hun haan ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs guidance on using labels.

- Customer needs assistance with photo pixel size.

- Customer receiving calls on WhatsApp.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about adding photos.

- Executive explained about labels in lead manager.

- Executive offered to call back later.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back later to guide on labels.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- labels, photos, lead manager, follow up
